title: Execute Phase 1: Service Diagnostics
description: Execute Phase 1 of the XNAi Operationalization Plan. Run service diagnostics, check health of all stack components (Redis, Qdrant, API, etc.), and report status. Refer to internal_docs/01-strategic-planning/sessions/02_16_2026_phase5_operationalization/MASTER-PLAN-v3.1.md.
